name: PENTA: The Sequel to OCTO
description:
Fullscreen is recommended. The browser version may not run well on older devices, so a download for windows is also available. If the game loses focus, try left clicking on the window, or refreshing the page.

The story continues...

PENTA: The Sequel to OCTO is a 90's style adventure and puzzle game. Once again, you must solve puzzles and read notes to destroy the island Penta and return to your world.

Controls  Left Click
Navigate Right ClickShow clickable areasAlt + Enter Enter fullscreen Escape Exit fullscreen Credits

A game by Dogtopius

Soundtrack by Talashar

Fonts

Tangerine
